title: YASUO TIPS? PLEASE.
body: Trying to learn yasuo more and more. And just wanting to know some tips from other Yasuo mains. :)

replies.body: Deathcap and Luden's Echo are must buys because E is a low cooldown spell that does magic damage and scales off AP. And then one shot people with E late game.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b0rLGfTo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-16T20:49:39.641+0000)
>
> Deathcap and Luden's Echo are must buys because E is a low cooldown spell that does magic damage and scales off AP. And then one shot people with E late game.

No, I have done that and no
NO. Man just trust me, I don't know why the LCS pros haven't done it yet. It's ridiculously OP.
I really want to see this, If I see a yas player do this and destroy me I wouldn't hate them so much, I'd in fact would be very impressed.
Dont play him top holy shit i see that so much and i wanna kms

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b0rLGfTo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-16T13:30:17.833+0000)
>
> Dont play him top holy shit i see that so much and i wanna kms

This is the only reason I came here, is to post this. Whoever plays him top, please stop. He is no good there, especially since there are such things in existence called "tanks". Also, most top laners in general are able to gap-close, dodge, CC, or otherwise make you regret your existence and rethink your life choices. Please, for the love of Valoran, STAY MID.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b0rLGfTo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-16T13:30:17.833+0000)
>
> Dont play him top holy shit i see that so much and i wanna kms

Because being top means you are very unlikely to carry later?

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b0rLGfTo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-16T14:55:41.039+0000)
>
> Because being top means you are very unlikely to carry later?

Well isnt there a little girl called riven top? also fiora jax and darius? all counters to yasuo. only play mid xD

Also renekton kayle swain etc

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b0rLGfTo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-16T15:04:07.412+0000)
>
> Well isnt there a little girl called riven top? also fiora jax and darius? all counters to yasuo. only play mid xD
> 
> Also renekton kayle swain etc

I thought annie was the little girl o: and yes jax can get fed top but I have only encountered him jg where he makes a great impact, I have to agree on fiora though she is a bitch if not handled correctly and darius can get really fed but he crumbles under a lot of pressure (and amour pen lol) 

Those last 3 never seen em fed tbh
press auto attack and then the fly ability into a windslash combo to get the ultimate pent

Well first things first, you get q. Then static shiv, wait till level 6 and don't level up any other ability. And that's all you need to know...oh wait, you need to just constantly spam q and it doesn't matter if you hit a target just hit it.
get e level 1 and use e to farm
Harrass by E'ing to a minion, Q the enemy, E back on a minion.

You change from being a yasuo main to a draven main then 1 shot the enemy adc late game with an auto. Your welcome!{{champion:119}} 

Remember its not Draven its Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven.
